bucket.description: The embedded storage bucket to compute the clusters from. The bucket must already be [embedded](https://developers.telnyx.com/api/inference/inference-embedding/post-embedding).

prefix.description: Prefix to filter whcih files in the buckets are included.

files.description: Array of files to filter which are included.

min_cluster_size.description: Smallest number of related text chunks to qualify as a cluster. Top-level clusters should be thought of as identifying broad themes in your data.

min_subcluster_size.description: Smallest number of related text chunks to qualify as a sub-cluster. Sub-clusters should be thought of as identifying more specific topics within a broader theme.
